channel.title: Tool on 雜
channel.description: Recent content in Tool on 雜

item.title: Mac Command Line Tools
item.description: homebrew /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" record terminal https://asciinema.org/ brew install asciinema asciinema rec mkdir -p Clear python cache files find . | grep -E "(__pycache__|\.pyc|\.pyo$)" | xargs rm -rf List binding ports lsof - list open files $ lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN SpotifyWe 465 byronzhu 5u IPv4 0xbb818c7dfcdfcc01 0t0 TCP 127.0.0.1:4380 (LISTEN) gotour 1773 byronzhu 3u IPv4 0xbb818c7e15913961 0t0 TCP 127.0.0.1:3999 (LISTEN) epmd 2888 byronzhu 3u IPv4 0xbb818c7dff51dc01 0t0 TCP *:4369 (LISTEN) epmd 2888 byronzhu 4u IPv6 0xbb818c7df2ef6031 0t0 TCP *:4369 (LISTEN) beam.
